result.html: A rún mo chroíOh love of my heart!
result.ponchtml: A rún mo ċroíOh love of my heart!

result.eng: The day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ga: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.orig: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.html: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ponchtml: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo ċroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.html: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad agam air i mo ċroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: Ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
